name: my-desktop-app
description: A desktop app built with EpiSensor framework and Tauri

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:sidecar: npm run build:server && npx esbuild dist/server/index.js --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=cjs --outfile=dist/server/bundle.cjs --external:sharp --external:canvas --external:bufferutil --external:utf-8-validate && npx pkg dist/server/bundle.cjs --targets node20-macos-arm64,node20-win-x64,node20-linux-x64 --output src-tauri/binaries/server --compress GZip
